mapper.insert: insert into spring_blogs (blog_no, blog_title, blog_writer, blog_content) values (spring_blog_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer.id}, #{content})
mapper.select: select A.blog_no as no , A.blog_title as title , A.blog_writer as "writer.id" , B.user_name as "writer.name" , B.user_email as "writer.email" , A.blog_content as content , A.blog_likes as likes , A.blog_comment_counts as commentCounts , A.blog_create_date as createdDate from spring_blogs A, spring_users B where A.blog_writer = B.user_id and A.blog_no = #{value}
